name: Conquer Online 2.0
summary: Conquer Online is an MMORPG developed by TQ Digital Entertainment. It is available in English, French, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish, Traditional Chinese, and Arabic. The game landscape is a two dimensional rendition of mythical China with three dimensional characters. The game has a straightforward combat-focused play style, incorporating common elements of many MMORPGs such as wealth, fame and character development.
